mapper.select: SELECT /*selectFiles */ fd.file_id, fd.real_file_name, fd.file_name, fd.reg_dtm, fd.web_path, fd.file_no, fd.phy_path FROM file_mst fm join file_dtl fd on fm.file_id = fd.file_id WHERE fm.file_id = #{fileId} ORDER BY file_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT /*insertFileMst */ INTO file_mst ( file_id, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*updateFileMst */ file_mst SET mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = sysdate() WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.delete: DELETE /*deleteFileDtl */ FROM file_dtl WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND file_no in ( #{fileNo} )
